text: jo log eemaan lae ve kahate hai, "koee soora kyon nahin utaree?" kintu jab ek pakkee soora avatarit kee jaatee hai, jisamen yuddh ka ullekh hota hai, to tum un logon ko dekhate ho jinake dilon mein rog hai ki ve tumhaaree or is prakaar dekhate hai jaise kisee par mrtyu kee behoshee chha gaee ho. to afasos hai unake haal par
